programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: Staring Into The Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a child’s disappearance threatens to unravel Wallat’s entire operation.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzi’s surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa – just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: In the heart of winter, several notables are found murdered. To advance investigations, Captain Delhaye decides to bring Juliette Hémon out of prison for a few days. The young woman had been imprisoned some years earlier for a strangely similar case.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: The Breach
programme.desc: A fatal car crash shudders a crisis-torn family. Completely lost and shaken to the core by his wife’s death, the husband undertakes his own investigation and learns the shattering truth about his spouse’s genuine woes and longings.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sébastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: An uplifting tale of Kacper, a charismatic high school history teacher who hides his progressing blindness from everyone around him to fulfil his educational duties. His methods are unorthodox, sometimes hilarious, and devilishly effective.

programme.title: Av é
programme.desc: While hitchhiking from Sofia to Ruse, Kamen meets Avé, a 17-year-old runaway girl. A compulsive liar, Avé keeps inventing new identities and backstories, which threaten to get Kamen deeper and deeper into trouble.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: Traces of Sandalwood
programme.desc: Adopted and living in Spain for years, a young woman returns to Mumbai to discover her roots, accompanied by a handsome Indian guide whom she romances.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Shenanigans
programme.desc: A mischievous young boy gets a bad school result and he decides to lie to his mom. Nhan thought everything is going well until his teacher calls his mom.

programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzi’s surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa – just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sébastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: Av é
programme.desc: While hitchhiking from Sofia to Ruse, Kamen meets Avé, a 17-year-old runaway girl. A compulsive liar, Avé keeps inventing new identities and backstories, which threaten to get Kamen deeper and deeper into trouble.

programme.title: I Have Electric Dreams
programme.desc: 16-year-old Eva is experiencing her sexual awakening and is desperate to leave the house she shares with her mother and younger sister and move in with her estranged father, a troubled artist who paints, sculpts, writes poetry and drinks too much.

programme.title: Traces of Sandalwood
programme.desc: Adopted and living in Spain for years, a young woman returns to Mumbai to discover her roots, accompanied by a handsome Indian guide whom she romances.

programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Murders in Pont-Aven
programme.desc: The bodies of two gallery owners are found. These murders are reminiscent of the death of Suzanne, a painter, 20 years ago. The investigation is led by Marion, Suzanne's daughter, and by Antoine who was in charge of the investigations at the time.

programme.title: Midnight At The Paradise
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: The Exception
programme.desc: Four women working at an NGO investigating war crimes are shaken when two of them receive death threats. While they Initially blame a Serbian war criminal, their suspicions turn on each other when a case of bullying in the office escalates.
